sentences.english: Perhaps he earned the money through ill means.
sentences.chinese: 或许他的钱是通过卑劣的手段挣来的。

sentences.english: Don't play a shabby trick on me.
sentences.chinese: 不要对我耍卑劣的手段。

sentences.english: In order to monopolize power, he does not hesitate to use every mean trick.
sentences.chinese: 为了能够掌权，他不惜使用各种卑劣手段。

sentences.english: You will only injure yourself if you take notice of despicable enemies.
sentences.chinese: 如果去在意卑劣的敌人，反而会身受其害。

sentences.english: Joseph had the power to destroy his jealous and envious and mean brothers.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟有权力处置他那些充满嫉妒和卑劣手段的哥哥们。

sentences.english: It is contemptible to cheat friends.
You can't let them walk all over you.
sentences.chinese: 不能让他们再使这种卑劣的手段了。

sentences.english: It strikes with the alacrity of the vilest viper, sapping your will with oaths to its venomous god.
sentences.chinese: 他向剧毒之神发誓，将以卑劣剧毒猛烈打击你的意志。

sentences.english: Added base item type to highlight info for rune word items.
sentences.chinese: 为如尼字母词项目强调信息添加卑劣项目类型。

sentences.english: I blushed for your degraded conduct.
sentences.chinese: 我为你的卑劣行为感到脸红。

sentences.english: He is above meanness and deceit.
sentences.chinese: 他不致于做出卑劣和欺骗的事情来。

sentences.english: The mean servant rifled the dead man's possessions.
sentences.chinese: 卑劣的仆人偷窃了这个去世男人的财产。

sentences.english: You have given all my money to a common thief and a vagabond .
sentences.chinese: 你把我所有的钱都给了一个手段卑劣的贼，一个无赖。

sentences.english: I don't know anyone who could have behaved so abominably.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道还有行为如此卑劣的人。

sentences.english: Once again his campaign is involved in dirty tricks.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次在竞选中卑劣地耍了手段。

sentences.english: How are we to know what sort of a hanky-panky trick you're up to?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎知道你会使出怎样的卑劣手段。

definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)
